rules.title: Confirm Patient Status
rules.action: Ask if the patient is new or established
rules.example: Hello, thank you for calling. Have you visited us before?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status
rules.action: Verbally acknowledge if they are new or established
rules.example: Okay, so you're an established patient...

rules.title: Request Established Patient ID
rules.action: Ask for identifying information (e.g., phone number, date of birth)
rules.example: Great, to help me find your chart, could I please get your phone number or date of birth?

rules.title: Acknowledge Info Receipt
rules.action: Confirm receipt and state you are retrieving their chart
rules.example: Thank you, I have that. Please give me a moment while I pull up your record.

rules.title: Ask Reason for Visit
rules.condition: Patient identity is confirmed and chart retrieved
rules.action: Inquire about the purpose of their call/visit
rules.example: Now that I have your chart, what can I help you with today?

rules.title: Confirm Usual Office
rules.action: Ask if they have a preferred or usual office location
rules.example: Okay, for that, do you usually see a particular doctor or go to a specific office location?

rules.title: Ask Preferred Appointment Time
rules.condition: After confirming the patient's preferred or usual office location.
rules.action: Ask the patient for their preferred day and time for the appointment.
rules.example: Great, and what day and time works best for your appointment?
